titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Joseph W. Reed Designs and Art Work Collection
Reed (Joseph W.) Designs and Art Work Collection
titlestmt.author: Compiled by Jae Rossman and Susan Brady

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Saturday December 8, 2018 at 00:01

did.unittitle: Joseph W. Reed designs and art work collection.
did.abstract: Collection contains personal papers, writings, and works of art, including paintings, drawings, designs, books, and other materials documenting the artistic career of Joseph W. Reed.

relatedmaterial.head: Associated Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Additional unprocessed Joseph Reed materials held by Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of Paul Horgan, 1991, and Joseph W. Reed.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been transferred to Yale University.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Joseph W. Reed Designs and Art Work Collection, Robert B. Haas Family Arts Library, Yale University.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Joseph W. Reed is a graduate of Yale University (B.A. 1954; M.A. 1958; Ph.D. 1961). Professor Emeritus of English and American Studies at Wesleyan University, Reed is a published author and artist working in a variety of genres, including painting, drawing, book arts, and medal design. He is particularly noted for his illustrated alphabets and his Piratical Primrose press publications.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Collection contains personal papers, writings, and works of art, including paintings, drawings, designs, books, and other materials documenting the artistic career of Joseph W. Reed.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Preliminarily arranged in three series: I. Personal Files, 1970-2002. II. Non-Commissioned Works, 1948-1995. III. Commissioned Works, 1972-1999.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series includes correspondence and other personal files, such as writings and research.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials are organized into the following subseries: Biographical information, Photographs, Correspondence and subject files, Writings about Reed, Writings by Reed, and Scrapbooks.

did.unittitle: "Painting by Letter," by Christopher Reed. In Horticulture , 1982 Feb., p. 61-64.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes the following: book jacket; proofs; press release; paste-ups for order form; printer's layout for dust jacket.

did.unittitle: Getting Started: The Beginnings of the Middletown YMCA .

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes the following: pamphlet; paste-ups with various initial letters; drawings for initial letters; correspondence regarding initial letters.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes the following: review of poetry manuscript for Wesleyan University Press; paste-up for announcement for lecture on satirical prints from the Lewis Walpole Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series includes various non-commissioned artworks by Reed.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials are organized into the following subseries: Alphabets; Piratical Primrose [Press]; Paintings and Watercolors; Prints; Sketches, Notes, etc.; Collages; Book Objects.
